_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on May 27, 2011 10:19:16_

Possibly due to games that do not terminate during simulation. Limit the maximum number of turns in a simulated game, if terminated early use the evaluation function to decide whether it is a win/lose.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=16_
